location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: First Page of a Letter from [David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf], at Bushire, to Major Hicks, Commander of the Marine Battalion, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is truncated, possibly as a result of weeding, which means that most of the letter is missing; the author is not specified but is in all likelihood David Anderson Blane. There is not enough content left to make out the letter's subject.
